about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Blacklist Mafia ruled by Chicago gangster empires. Get ready for an exciting adventure filled with humor and intrigue that will immerse you in an atmosphere of unbridled joy and danger.

Created with love for detail, the game will amaze you with its stunning visual style. A deep plot and an interesting story will guide you through tangled intrigues, betrayals and unexpected turns of events.

Join Blacklist Mafia to feel the power and influence of the gangster world. Are you ready to become a legend or will you end up on the blacklist? Show off your strength, skill and charisma in this exciting game that will leave you impressed until the very end.
detailed_description:
Welcome to the world of Blacklist Mafia ruled by Chicago gangster empires. Get ready for an exciting adventure filled with humor and intrigue that will immerse you in an atmosphere of unbridled joy and danger.

Created with love for detail, the game will amaze you with its stunning visual style. A deep plot and an interesting story will guide you through tangled intrigues, betrayals and unexpected turns of events.

Join Blacklist Mafia to feel the power and influence of the gangster world. Are you ready to become a legend or will you end up on the blacklist? Show off your strength, skill and charisma in this exciting game that will leave you impressed until the very end.
name: Blacklist Mafia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
  • VR Support: -

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
  • VR Support: -

reviews:
“I really liked this game because there are moments like in real life, the game is cool, I was very happy to play it and now it's my favorite game thanks to the Developer for such a pleasant game”
5 – Gospodin

“Игра просто шикарная! Я был приятно удивлен графикой и детализацией мира. Сюжет держит в напряжении до самого конца, а персонажи запоминаются своей харизмой. Классная озвучка”
5 – MrBlack

“It's a rather short game, and actually not that much of a game but more like an interactive story. You don't do much, other than walking right/left, talk to people and click the mouse to throw some fists a few times. 90% of the game is just conversations, the audio is fixed russian, the subtitles english or russian. There are exactly 3 options, the text language and volume of the voices and music. The conversations are also fixed, they just tell the story and cannot be stopped, only skipped. The game does not even have a save function, you have to finish it in one go, which is less than 2h. I have more than that, because I had to start over, after closing the game yesterday. I still recommend the game, mainly because i'm learning russian atm, and the dialogues are on the easier side and I liked the humor. The voice actors are very good, they speak clearly and fit their roles, but could speak a smidgin slower in some cases. However, I don't regret buying it, and I will play it again with russian subtitles in a few week”
5 – Severus
short_description: Blacklist Mafia - is not only a struggle for power and money, but also a dangerous game of survival. Who will be blacklisted, and who will become the new boss? Find out with us!
